rules_text:
{2}{W}{W}{B}{B}: Destroy all permanents. Each player may put four lands destroyed this way onto the battlefield tapped.
{2}{W}{B}: Return RX08 Choose The Now from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed.
flavor_text: [i]There are two roads set before every individual... The left and the right...[/i]
rules_text2:
First strike, Deathtouch
Sacrifice M: Target creature you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
If M would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, exile it instead.
